first_para: Anna Mary Soubry (born 7 December 1956) is a British Conservative Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Broxtowe since the 2010 general election and Minister of State for Defence Personnel, Welfare and Veterans since 2014.

full.extract:
Anna Mary Soubry (born 7 December 1956) is a British Conservative Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Broxtowe since the 2010 general election and Minister of State for Defence Personnel, Welfare and Veterans since 2014.
The Independent's Simon Carr has stated that "she has a record of unusually free speech". Since July 2014 she has been Minister of State for Defence.
full.title: Anna Soubry
